c.x: First Reading and Committee Referral.      A Bill or Resolution shall be re
Second Reading and Committee Consideration.    If referred to a committee,
Explanation of the Bill or Resolution by the author;

General Order.     If the Speaker declines to refer a Bill or Resolution to
Amendments.        Amendments to Bills or Resolutions shall be made in writ
Advancement.       A member may make a motion to advance a Bill or Resoluti
Third Reading. Upon Third Reading, the Council shall not consider amendment
No member shall interrupt another member in debate without the speaking mem
No member shall speak more than once upon any question in debate.
The author of the Bill or Resolution shall always speak last in debate unle
No member shall, directly or indirectly, by any form of words impute to any
No member shall use any media, prop, or other materials during debate.
No references shall be made to any guest in attendance during debate.
No member shall delegate their time in debate to any other person.
The Presiding Officer shall have the duty and power to confine members to t
Debate.    Any member may call for debate on Third Reading.  Those members
Fourth Reading.    After debate, or if no debate is called, a Bill or Resol
